data.text:
Chiba Lotte Marines live scores, schedule and results from all baseball tournaments that Chiba Lotte Marines played.

Chiba Lotte Marines next match

Chiba Lotte Marines will play the next match on Aug 13, 2024, 9:00:00 AM UTC against Hokkaido Nippon-Ham Fighters in Pro Yakyu - NPB.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Hokkaido Nippon-Ham Fighters vs Chiba Lotte Marines scores, updated live as the match progress.

Statistics are updated at the end of the game.

Chiba Lotte Marines previous match

Chiba Lotte Marines previous match was against Orix Buffaloes in Pro Yakyu - NPB, match ended with result 0 - 4 (Orix Buffaloes won the match).

Chiba Lotte Marines fixtures tab is showing last 100 baseball matches with statistics and win/lose icons.

There are also all Chiba Lotte Marines scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Chiba Lotte Marines performance and form graph is Sofascore’s unique algorithm that we are generating from the team’s last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help you predict Chiba Lotte Marines future matches.
